products.title: Bella Primrose Roman Blind
products.description: This floral window blind is perfect for bringing a pretty touch plus practical shading to a kitchen or a bedroom. Using a cotton blend fabric with delicate embroidery in fresh yellow and green tones, the bella primrose roman blind is an uplifting option that is bursting with charm and will suit a traditionally inspired interior. Product id: db-rom1052 fabric colour: primrose material: 52% polyester 48% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Bella Frost Roman Blind
products.description: Simple stripes have always been something of a staple for harlequin and we just love the way they combine colours to get the most out of this sophisticated design. Bella frost takes a cool blue palette and blends it with some soft greys to bring you a refined and highly cultur simple stripes have always been something of a staple for harlequin and we just love the way they combine colours to get the most out of this sophisticated design.

products.title: Rosabella Charcoal
products.description: Min width: 350mm max width: 1250mm min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 50% polyester / 50% cotton with polyester embroidery guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
